pages.text: The Spectral Potion of Flame can be created by collecting fire by $(4)right-clicking$() and can be soul-infused into a Spectral Potion of Affliction.
The Spectral Potion of Affliction can be thrown to spawn a lingering cloud that inflicts a random negative effect
The Spectral Potion of Water can be created by collecting up water by $(4)right-clicking$() and can be soul-infused into a Spectral Potion of Purifying.
The Spectral Potion of Purifying can be thrown to spawn a lingering cloud that dispels all negative effects.
